data.message: Hey Shadey, I'm Lynn, I'm in Africa and before I go on and say anything else let me say this... fck anyone who tries to b racist out here... With dat outta the way, I'm in Ghana west Africa, I have loved Eminem since I knew how to listen to songs, he always has something to say that just gets straight to you as if he knows wat you are going through, man you are a legend n if one day you find yourself in Ghana, I will be at where ever you are. I wish I didn't scribble your address to sloppy when I jotted it down, or maybe my local post office is messed up... You are the best ever, 👍🏼 if you agree
